Name: Exaud's Group
description:
This is not the first season that Exaud is working alongside One Acre Fund. He has been a member for a few years now, having joined the program in 2014. Although he is the only person featured in the above picture, he is actually representing his group of seven farmers in Iringa District, Tanzania.

Exaud is often described by his community as a very friendly person and decided to be the one to represent his group because he wanted to spread the story of One Acre Fund farmers. Like many of his fellow farmers, Exaud decided he wanted to be part of the One Acre Fund community in order to have access to the best seed prices. He hopes to use the profits from this yearâ€™s harvest to repair his home.

This loan will help not only Exaud, but the whole group, who will receive maize seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 6.5 acres of land.
